snippet: A man at a hearing in a fraudulent bankruptcy opened fire in a Milan courthouse on Thursday, killing a judge, a lawyer and a co-defendant and wounding at least two others.
abstract: Italian man Claudio Giardello opens fire inside Milan courthouse, killing three people, including a judge, during bankruptcy hearing.
lead_paragraph: A man at a hearing in a fraudulent bankruptcy opened fire in a Milan courthouse on Thursday, killing a judge, a lawyer and a co-defendant and wounding at least two others.

headline.main: Italy: Man Kills 3 at Court During Bankruptcy Hearing
headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Man Kills 3 at Court During Bankruptcy Hearing
